item.title: How do i start up a server? plz help me i need 2 know
item.dc:creator: @boij7 boij7
item.description:
@boij7 wrote:

I know
First

  1. Get Java Latest

  2. Get source

  3. Edit it if u want
    4.Compile +Run
    5.Open up ur mopar client and run
    6.Download NO-IP DUC or HAMACHI
    7.Portforward
    8.Go to mopar advertise page n advertise ur server.
    9.ENJOY!AND!PLAY!!

                              This is a rough making server guide. 
                                  REP if HElPFUL
